    • Method Detail

      • QueryFormat

        public static java.lang.String QueryFormat(java.lang.String userQuery)
        Formats the query provided by the user by replacing spaces with underscores. Example: userQuery = "Mad Max" would be turned into "Mad_Max"
        Parameters:
        userQuery - query provided by user to be formatted
        Returns:
        returns string formatted with underscores

      • WikipediaSearch

        public static void WikipediaSearch(java.lang.String formattedQuery)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a parser. Then runs the function "fetchFirstParagraph" using said parser. "fetchFirstParagrah" uses formattedQuery to search wikipedia. If an article is not found (returning a 404 error) using formattedQuery, returns "Not found." If an article is found, it is displayed to the user. If wikipedia returns multiple articles for which it believes may be suitable for the users query, the program will return something similar to "MAD or Mad may refer to :" (for the query "mad")
        Parameters:
        formattedQuery - query that has been formatted by QueryFormat that will be used to search Wikipedia
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Asks the user for a query. Until the user inputs a non blank query, the program will continue to ask for a query.
        Parameters:
        args -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
